body:
Now that we have a class, it would be nice to give the conditions a proper name with private predicate-style helper methods. 

Example:

```ruby
  # …
  @users = @users.with_assigned_roles if current_season_has_begun?
  # …
end

private

def current_season_has_begun?
  Time.now.utc > (Season.current.starts_at || Date.new)
end
```
